title: Careers in Alternative Medicine (Career Resource Library) (Library Binding)
author: Alan Steinfeld
cleaned_text: You are here [Back to top](#skip-link) Careers in Alternative Medicine (Career Resource Library) (Library Binding) $55.72 Email or call for price. Email or call for price. Description Today many people are taking an active part in staying healthy, which may include seeking alternatives to conventional medicine. This volume presents the philosophy behind holistic medicine, examines various therapies, and suggests how to become involved in this increasingly popular field.
